info.name: Pride FurAffinity
info.description: A FurAffinity style by Cooped. Uploaded on 2014.08.21. My pride colors with my code elements. Enjoy. Activation instructions in release notes. FA FurAffinity Black Slime Pride Bear Cooped
info.additionalInfo:
Activation Instructions Chrome users install with Stylish, then edit, and add these lines to the code to activate the theme:
@import url("http://www.BlackSlime.com/Stylish4Chrome/BSMFA_Core_News.css"); @import url("http://www.BlackSlime.com/Stylish4Chrome/Pride_FA.css");
 Firefox users install with Stylish, then edit, and remove the /* and */ from around the first @import line. Updates 2014.08.21 ---------------------------------- Initial upload, Firefox 28+/Chrome 4+ compatible.
